channel.title: Comments on: Nzou nekamba
channel.description: A detailed history of the Shona people of Zimbabwe

item.title: By: Sekuru Mhofu
item.dc:creator: Sekuru Mhofu
item.description: Kana Bhaibheri rinoreva kuti njere shoma dzinopa muviri mabasa akawanda. Ukaona samba rine nzou nemafambiro ekamba nzou angadai asina kumbobvira azvishoresa kusvika ipapo. Nzou akashandiswa nekuti pfungwa dzakaita shoma. Kamba aitoziva kuti haangakwikwidzane akabudirira saka akashandisa njere dzakapinza. Chokwadi ngano idzi hadzidi kutarisira pasi. Zvemakwikwi tanga waona kuti auri kukwikwidzana naye muchatevedza mitemo ipi. Munofanira kuvewo namuzvinapembe anoongorora kuti hapana anozodambudzira here nekutyora mitemo.
item.content:encoded: Kana Bhaibheri rinoreva kuti njere shoma dzinopa muviri mabasa akawanda. Ukaona samba rine nzou nemafambiro ekamba nzou angadai asina kumbobvira azvishoresa kusvika ipapo. Nzou akashandiswa nekuti pfungwa dzakaita shoma. Kamba aitoziva kuti haangakwikwidzane akabudirira saka akashandisa njere dzakapinza. Chokwadi ngano idzi hadzidi kutarisira pasi. Zvemakwikwi tanga waona kuti auri kukwikwidzana naye muchatevedza mitemo ipi. Munofanira kuvewo namuzvinapembe anoongorora kuti hapana anozodambudzira here nekutyora mitemo.
